title: Anna and the Dancing Goose
description: Anna loves everything about Easter. Her grandmother brings her Easter eggs and a gift-a music box with a goose dancing inside a blue egg. Anna is curious, so her grandmother tells her the story of the dancing goose. Students will have the opportunity to sequence events and reflect on family connections in this story within a story.
meta: alone, always, brought, dancing, hurt, music box
Use the reading strategy of making predictions to understand text
Sequence Events : Sequence events in the story
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime
Consonant Digraphs : Identify and read words that contain consonant digraph sh
Past-Tense Verbs : Recognize and use past-tense verbs
Onomatopoeia : Recognize and give examples of onomatopoeia

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
